1539428.name: v1.4
1539428.body:
Bump! 🇬🇦 

> Nette Forms 2.3 update and Bootstrap 3 improvements

Changes:

- update with netteForms.js code from Nette Forms 2.3
- use better default values for Bootstrap 3
  - add "text-danger" to errorMessageClass
  - set glyphicon icon for errorMessagePrefix
- reformat options' comments to new lines

1572823.name: v1.4.1
1572823.body:
Bump! 🅰️ 

> Fix removing errors created by server-validation

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/live-form-validation/compare/v1.4...v1.4.1

Changes:

- Fix removing errors without ID (e.g. created by server-validation)
- Small cleanup

1866399.name: v1.5.0
1866399.body:
Bump! 🥅 

> On-load validation, better processing server-errors, various fixes

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/live-form-validation/compare/v1.4.1...v1.5.0

Changes:

- Don't append error message to radio/checkbox input's label, but along label
- Fix order of showing error message and focusing element
- Rework processing server-validation errors
- Support for on-load validation
- Add new special class "enableHiddenMessageClass"
- Code and options cleanup (renamed various options names)
- Add bower.json
- Various other fixes

2272198.name: v1.6.1
2272198.body:
Bump! 🗡 

> Useful improvements

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/live-form-validation/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1

Changes:

- More convenient way for changing options
- Fix compatibility with Grido

2272221.name: v1.6.0
2272221.body:
Bump! 🤕 

> Compatibility and special error cases improvements

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/live-form-validation/compare/v1.5.0...v1.6.0

Changes:

- Support for validating forms that weren't initialized properly (compatibility with Grido)
- Support form elements with none or duplicit id
- Small other fixes and changes

2355207.name: v1.5.1
2355207.body:
# :hamburger: v1.5.1
- Change addClass -> class (https://github.com/minetro/reCAPTCHA/commit/ae94b6487a82ef593eecd4e2feea30911f442257)
- More examples in README

2703199.name: v1.6.2
2703199.body:
Bump! 🌫 

> New option for message parent

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/live-form-validation/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2

Changes:

- Added new option 'messageParentClass' to put message into specific parent (not direct one)

3452320.name: v1.7.0
3452320.body:
Bump! 🏭 

> Finally validating multi elements

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/live-form-validation/compare/v1.6.2...v1.7.0

Changes:

- Implement correct handling of multi elements  (e.g. CheckBoxList, RadioList)
- Update netteForms.js code to latest master version

3553989.name: v1.6.0
3553989.body:
Bumped! :space_invader: 
- Fixed Nette serie ~2.3. 
- This is last release for Nette 2.3.

3811502.body:

4322166.name: v0.2
4322166.body:
Changes:
- tiny typos in examples
- fix binding bug

4405027.name: v5.0.0
4405027.body: ## Added - #276: Multi action column. ([documentation](http://ublaboo.org/datagrid/action#multi-action)) - #386: Escape column identifier in DibiFluentDataSource. - #387: Added latte block for outer filter. - #388: Collapsible filters. **(Possible BC break)** ([documentation](http://ublaboo.org/datagrid/filter#outer-filters-rendering)) - #404: Row condition for item detail. ([documentation](http://ublaboo.org/datagrid/action#item-detail-render-condition)) - #405: Sorting datagrid by multiple columns. ([documentation](http://ublaboo.org/datagrid/column#multiple-columns-sort)) - #413: Basic support for related columns in nette/database. ([documentation](http://ublaboo.org/datagrid/data-source#nette-database-table-data-source)) - #417: Improved tests with unix compatibility. - Option to show content of non-editable columns when editing. ([documentation](http://ublaboo.org/datagrid/edit#show-non-editing-columns)) - Option to reset single column filter using icon-remove in column header. ## Fixed - #340: Inline edit Uncaught TypeError: `$.nette.ajax(...).success` is not a function. - #360: Each column render cycle adds already existing classes. - #389: Session filter: Filter not found when modifying grid columns. - #390: Fix sorting by date in ArrayDataSource. - #395: Syntax error, unrecognized expression: `.datagrid-tree-item[data-id=]`. - #397: Icons have been unified to use `` tag. - #400: Fix double confirmation before ajax call. - #406: Fixed array source getCount method. - #420: Unable to add placeholders for range filters. - Column name escaping for DibiDataSource. ## Dropped - Support of PHP 5.5 ## Deprecated - #393: Wrong method name _deleteSesssionData_. - #408: Method name on Filter _getAttribtues_. [Changelog](https://github.com/ublaboo/datagrid/compare/v4.4.22...v5.0.0) **Thanks for the contributions:** @dakorpar, @roman-vohnik, @PingusPepan, @attreid, @FVesely & @jakubvojacek.

4856689.name: v5.0.1
4856689.body:
## Added
-  #425: `$columnLink->setOpenInNewTab` has been made fluent.

## Fixed

[Changelog](https://github.com/ublaboo/datagrid/compare/v5.0.0...v5.0.1)

**Thanks for the contributions:** @dakorpar

4915056.body:

5222384.name: v0.1.2
5222384.body:
Bumped! :spades:

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/middlewares/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2

Changes:
- added a few middlewares implementations
  - `ConditionMiddleware`
    - `UrlPathFilter`
  - `GroupMiddleware`
  - `GroupBuilderMiddleware`
  - `ContentNegotiationMiddleware`
    - `SuffixNegotiationStrategy`
      - `JsonNegotiator`
- relax dependencies

5255933.name: v0.2
5255933.body:
Bumped! :golf: 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/middlewares/compare/v0.1.2...v0.2

Changes:
- added some validations
- change *Extension parameters (added middlewares & root key) [BC!]
- added middlewares
  - `AbstractRootMiddleware`
  - `AutoBasePathMiddleware`
  - `RouterMiddleware`
- dropped middlewares:
  - `ContentNegotiationMiddleware`
- renamed middlewares:
  - `ConditionMiddleware` -> `ExcludeConditionMiddleware`
- added `Regex` class 
- added factories:
  - `PresenterMiddlewareFactory`

5256281.name: v0.2
5256281.body:
Bumped! :dog2: 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/api/compare/v0.1...v0.2

Changes:
- rewritten ApiMiddleware (BC!)
- introduced invokers concept:
  - ApiRouter (`maps and parses request URL(s)`)
  - ApiContentNegotiation (`converts data to any formats`)
    - UrlNegotiator (`negotiates content data by URL suffix`)
      - JsonTransformer (`encodes / decodes data`)
  - ApiEmitter (`passes requests to ApiDispatcher`)
  - synchronize trailing slashes (at the start, at the end)

5283781.body:

5401035.name: v1.0.0-alpha.1
5401035.body:

- Added phpstan to CI
- Updated to PHP 7.1 and Nette 3.0
- Added .editorconfig file
- Added scripts section to composer.json

6670914.name: v5.3.0
6670914.body:
## Added:
- Enabled FilterSelect::setPrompt($prompt = NULL) for setting/resetting filter select prompt, thx @kuchy
- Added counter for showing selected rows count (could be disabled, but enabled by default) thx @dakorpar

## Fixed:

- Addd support for groupped NDBT selection, thx @temistokles
- Data items count after filtering in ArrayDataSource, thx @sallyx
- Some JS (using `.length` instead of `.size()`)

7226246.name: v1.2.0
7226246.body:
Bump! 🍨 

Changes:

- update CI testing
- update readme

7293733.name: v0.2.2
7293733.body:
Bump! :goberserk: 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/api/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2

Changes:
- added schema validators [#1] [#2]
- analyse via phpstan [#10]
- added content negotiation
- many small improvements

7306551.name: v0.2
7306551.body:
Bump! :a: 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/di/compare/v0.1...v0.2

Changes:
- introduces ContextAware [#3]
- rewrite AutoloadExtension -> ResourceExtension [#2]

7314774.name: v0.2
7314774.body:
Bump! 🔡 

Diff:  https://github.com/contributte/psr7-http-message/compare/v0.1.4...v0.2

Changes:
 - added request/response factories (`Request::of($request)`
 - added some useful methods: `appendBody`, `writeBody`, `writeJsonBody`, `getContents`, `getJsonBody`, `hasQueryParam`, `getQueryParam`, `withAttributes`
 - added extra traits for Request, ServerRequest, Response
 - added huge amount of tests

7314924.name: v0.3
7314924.body:
Bump! 🤒 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/middlewares/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3

Changes:
- added own QA ruleset
- added huge amount of tests
- drop middleware namespace 
- make nette/http dependency optional
- remove unused middlewares:
  - `ExcludeConditionMiddleware`
  - `Filter/UrlPathFilter`
  - `GroupMiddleware`
  - `RouterMiddleware`
- use SmartObject instead of custom events 
- DI: allow use middlewares as defined services or as string
- ChainBuilder: added useful methods + factory
- rename StandaloneMiddlewareExtension -> MiddlewaresExtension
- rename NetteMiddlewareExtension -> NetteMiddlewaresExtension
- backport manual dispatching of Application events

7362458.name: v0.3
7362458.body:
Bump! 🔪 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/api/compare/v0.2.2...v0.3

Changes:
 - namespace refactoring (drop Bridges)
 - rename Factory/Generator to Serialization
 - rename Validators to Validations
 - ApiResponse/ApiRequest don't composite PSR7, they extend
 - simplify whole middlewares usage
 - simplify ApiExtension
 - added new Api2MiddlewaresExtension to easy use of middlewares
 - simplify Transformers (from 2 interfaces to 1 interface)
 - direct dependencies: contributte/psr7-http-message, contributte/middlewares, contributte/phpdoc
 - tiny micro refactorings
 - added huge amount of tests

8668223.body: - add support to include files of every type (e. g. json)

8705766.name: v0.8.0
8705766.body:
- Added simple extension for PHPStan
- NetteDIModule no longer compiles the Container before each test by default
- Added newContainerForEachTest option (closes #3)
- Removed configurator option
- Removed DoctrineModule
- Added phpstan to CI
- Updated to PHP 7.1
- Added .editorconfig file
- Added scripts section to composer.json
- Added PHP 7 strict types to all files
- Removed copyright headers from src directory
- Removed Nette\Object
- Simplified Arachne\Codeception\Http\Request class
- Simplified development dependencies
- Remove usage of deprecated method in nette/di

8880067.name: v0.8.1
8880067.body: - The `useConfigFiles` method now works with absolute paths (by @fmasa)

8977934.name: v1.9.0
8977934.body:

- moved under contributte organization

- added Travis CI releases
- fixed ReferenceError prop is not defined
- fixed range validator for min & max validator [#38]

9112338.name: v5.4.11
9112338.body: - Assets: fixed hiding of inline edit button

9133742.body: - TButtonRenderer trait (so even ToolbarButton can be rendered by custom callback)

9170145.name: v1.1.0
9170145.body: - Support for exactSearch/splitWordsSearch properties in FilterText (thanks @kuchy !)

9193573.name: v5.5.0
9193573.body:
## New features

- Link creation update - look for signal handler in the whole way up to the UI\Presenter, fixes #592
- ColumnsSummary: added support for custom renderer (thanks @vitkutny)
- Add option to set render condition callback on action (thanks @jankonas)

## Fixes

- Fixed sorting on column, which has defined default descending sort (thanks @proki)
- Use single quotes when finding option in inline edit (thanks @FilipLukac)

9208202.name: v5.5.1
9208202.body:
Fixes:

- TLink: Try to create presenter link when there is a colon in the link string (fixes link creation to presenter action)

9208785.name: v5.5.2
9208785.body: - Fixed sorting: let the previous remain after filtering

10445853.name: v0.2
10445853.body:
Bump! :tada: 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/neonizer/compare/v0.1...v0.2

Changes:
- internal refactoring
- PHP 7.1 [#3]
- support more commands:
  - validate (thanks @jiripudil) [#2] [#1]
  - set

-----

```json
"scripts": {
    "set-config": [
      "Contributte\\Neonizer\\NeonizerExtension::set"
    ]
}
```

Then run:

```sh
composer set-config -- $(pwd)/app/config/config.local.neon --database.host=localhost --database.user=neonizer
```

Do you like **environment variables**? 


```sh
composer set-config -- $(pwd)/app/config/config.local.neon --database.host=$DATABASE_HOST --database.user=$DATABASE_USER
```

to

```yaml
extensions:

```

11477207.name: v0.3
11477207.body:
Bump! :abcd: 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/bootstrap/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3

Changes:

- pluggable configurator [#2] 
- ability to detect debug mode by file [#4] 
- PHP 5.6 -> PHP 7.1 [#5] [#6] 

BC break:

You have to enable ENV parsing explicit.

Before:

```php
$configurator = new ExtraConfigurator();
```

After

```php
$configurator = new ExtraConfigurator();
$configurator->setEnvDebugMode();
```
